reviewText: I bought this dvd for my granddaughters.  My youngest granddaughter just loves this moovie, she has watched this movie throughout the year.  She watches the dvd all day long over and over.  This is her favorite movie.  We give it five stars.

My daughter is in love with this movie. She is a huge Barbie fan. This is such a cute movie. It would be a great stocking stuffer or present for any Barbie fan. Barbie and her sisters are always getting into something and their holiday is no different. It is a cute movie to keep kids entertained.
Love Barbie.  Love Christmas.  Love the CD.

This is a great Barbie movie! I bought the old version two years ago, and we watch it so much around the holidays, but also once in a while during the rest if the year. My girls are 2 and 5, and we are big fans if Barbie movies. If this version is the same or close, it's def a classic Barbie movie you have to see.

This a wonderful Christmas movie but it is a rerelease. It was originally released in 2011. The packaging is new not sure if there is much else different between the two besides the price.  I gave it 5 stars for the movie itself. But I recommend  getting the cheaper one if you p ly care about having the movie.

Not only is this my favorite DVD in the Barbie series, but it appears as if other reviewers feel the same as I.

Barbie and her sisters fly out of California for a Christmas holiday to be spent with their aunt in New York City. Bad weather forces their plane to land in Minnesota and from there the adventure begins. The sisters come upon a beautiful home nestled in the snow filled hills. There something kinda unique about this home and the folks who live in it. But you will have to find out what it is that makes this place so special at this time of the year..

You won't go wrong with this Barbie episode and it should easily become a classic that is shown in your home during Christmas every year. It will bring back such happy memories your family enjoyed during the holiday season.
my daughter loves this movie, and I don't mind listening to it either.
My girls love Barbie movies and this was great!
My 3 and 5 year olds really enjoyed the movie. Perfect "Christmas" movie for their age.
Bought for Christmas for my granddaughter and she loved it
Bought for my grand-daughter. Loved it.
